[Home](./index.md) &gt; [bitburner](./bitburner.md) &gt; [CharityORG](./bitburner.charityorg.md) &gt; [spendKarma](./bitburner.charityorg.spendkarma.md)

## CharityORG.spendKarma() method

Spend Karma.

**Signature:**

```typescript
spendKarma(opt1: string, opt2: string, spendOn: number | string, opt3?: string | number): boolean | string[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt1 | string | Type of boost - 'boost charity', 'sleeves', 'time' |
|  opt2 | string | Name of Secondary option - 'bank', 'overclock', etc |
|  spendOn | number \| string | Amount of karma to spend, name of Augment or "list" to get a list back of available augments |
|  opt3 | string \| number | _(Optional)_ Optional unless needed. Chosen sleeve. Can be 'all' for all sleeves |

**Returns:**

boolean \| string\[\]

true if karma was spent, false if not

## Remarks

RAM cost: 4 GB

Spend your karma on anything you like.

“Bonus time” is accumulated when the game is offline or if the game is inactive in the browser.

## Example


```js
ns.charityORG.spendKarma("Boost Charity", "Bank", 555)
ns.charityORG.spendKarma("Sleeves", "Overclock", 200, 0)
ns.charityORG.spendKarma("Sleeves", "Overclock", 200, "all")
ns.charityORG.spendKarma("Sleeves", "Augments", "list", 2)
ns.charityORG.spendKarma("Time", "Time Gate", 1000)
```
